title: Leading convention centers in Canada as of June 2017 , by size
yAxis: Exhibition space in thousand square feet
summary: The Leading convention Buildings in the Canada June was Buildings The_International_Centre_Toronto , who made 1000.0 space .
The most convention Buildings was Evraz_Place , with just 311.5 space .

In second place was Buildings The_Toronto_Congress_Centre with 1000.0 space ; third place went to Buildings Enercare_Centre with 1000.0 space ; fourth place went to Buildings Vancouver_Convention_Centre with 311.5 space and fifth place went to Buildings Metro_Toronto_Convention_Centre , who was 460.0 space .
gold: This statistic shows the leading convention centers in Canada as of June 2017 , by size . The Enercare Centre and The Toronto Congress Centre were the largest convention centers in Canada at one million square feet each .
